Package itb.arkavquarium

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • itb.arkavquarium.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    class GameController
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

    GameController! The GameController class controls the state of the game as well as controlling what's going to be shown by the GameView.

    Since:
    2018-04-15
    Version:
    0.0
    Author:
    Abram Situmorang, Faza Fahleraz, Senapati Sang Diwangkara, Yusuf Rahmat Pratama
